content.question: In the sixth paragraph, the author uses the story of the name His Horse Stands in Sight to illustrate which of the following?

choices.label: Crazy Horse’s combination of recklessness and calculating calm
Mounted battle tactics that came to characterize Lakota warfare
Crazy Horse’s reputation among his people as a model of humility
The storytelling style of a participant in the waktoglaka ceremony

content.answer: Crazy Horse’s combination of recklessness and calculating calm

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
